definitions.text: give an assignment to (a person) to a post, or assign a task to (a person)

examples: We attributed this quotation to Shakespeare
People impute great cleverness to cats

definitions.text: select something or someone for a specific purpose
examples: The teacher assigned him to lead his classmates in the exercise
She put too much emphasis on her the last statement
He put all his efforts into this job
The teacher put an interesting twist to the interpretation of the story

definitions.text: decide as to where something belongs in a scheme
examples: The biologist assigned the mushroom to the proper class
